Name: The Cavern
About the game: The Cavern is a puzzle-adventure game designed exclusively for room-scale VR . Solve puzzles, overcome riddles and venture deeper into the darkness in search of one of the greatest lost treasures of our time. Do you have what it takes to uncover the hidden secrets of the cavern, or will you just end up another lost soul? Make your way through four beautifully crafted main rooms that safeguard the ancient treasure. Each step of the way will hold multiple unique puzzles and challenges for you to investigate and solve. Find fully voice acted notes from previous explorers. Learn these peopleâ€™s stories and utilize the equipment they left behind.
